title: Concavescent
text:
everyone’s so loud
when will I hit the ground?
stuck in this crowd
everyone’s so loud
I don’t wanna feel this sound
when will I hit the ground

everyone’s so free
when will I leave your knee?
just wanna see
everyone’s so free
I don’t have to have your key
when will I leave your knee

everyone’s the same
when will we break the chain?
am I insane?!
everyone’s the same
I just want my own name
when will we break the chain

do you understand
do I understand
where do you stand
where do I stand
am I a man?
do I understand?
I just wanna use my hands
